recipes.name: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A timeless Italian pasta dish featuring spaghetti tossed in a creamy egg and Parmesan cheese sauce, with crispy bacon.

ingredients.name: Oscar Mayer Fully Cooked Bacon (8 slices)
Pompeian Extra Virgin Olive Oil (16 oz)

recipes.instructions:
1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente.
  2. In a skillet, cook bacon until crispy. Remove bacon and chop into small pieces.
  3. In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.
  4. Drain spaghetti and add it to the skillet with the bacon fat. Turn off the heat.
  5. Quickly pour the egg mixture over the hot spaghetti and toss until the eggs thicken and coat the pasta.
  6. Serve immediately with additional grated Parmesan cheese and black pepper on top.

recipes.name: Vegetarian Chickpea Curry
recipes.description: A flavorful and comforting curry made with chickpeas simmered in a fragrant coconut milk sauce, served over brown rice.

ingredients.name: Thai Kitchen Organic Coconut Milk (13.66 oz)
McCormick Gourmet Organic Curry Powder (1.7 oz)
Uncle Ben's Whole Grain Brown Rice (32 oz)

recipes.instructions:
1. In a large skillet, saut√© chopped onion, minced garlic, and grated ginger until softened.
  2. Add drained chickpeas, coconut milk, and curry powder. Simmer for 10-15 minutes.
  3. Meanwhile, cook brown rice according to package instructions.
  4. Serve chickpea curry over cooked rice.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.description: A classic salad featuring grilled chicken breast served over crisp romaine lettuce, tossed in creamy Caesar dressing and topped with Parmesan cheese and croutons.

ingredients.name: Perdue Fresh Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts (2 lb)
Pepperidge Farm Classic Caesar Croutons (5 oz)

recipes.instructions:
1. Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Grill until cooked through, about 6-8 minutes per side.
  2. Chop romaine lettuce and toss with Caesar dressing.
  3. Slice grilled chicken and place on top of the salad.
  4. Sprinkle grated Parmesan cheese and croutons over the salad. Serve with lemon wedges on the side.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: A family-friendly meal featuring seasoned ground beef served in soft flour tortillas with shredded cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and sour cream.

ingredients.name: Mission Soft Taco Flour Tortillas (10 count)
McCormick Original Taco Seasoning Mix (1 oz)

recipes.instructions:
1. In a skillet, brown ground beef over medium heat. Drain excess fat.
  2. Add taco seasoning mix and water according to package instructions. Simmer for 5 minutes.
  3. Warm tortillas in a separate skillet or microwave.
  4. Assemble tacos with beef, shredded cheese, diced tomatoes, diced onions, and any other desired toppings.

recipes.name: Pesto Pasta with Cherry Tomatoes
recipes.description: A simple and vibrant pasta dish featuring penne pasta tossed in basil pesto sauce and garnished with sweet cherry tomatoes.

ingredients.name: Barilla Classic Basil Pesto Sauce (6.3 oz)

recipes.instructions:
1. Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente.
  2. In a large skillet, heat pesto sauce over medium heat. Add halved cherry tomatoes and cooked pasta.
  3. Toss until the pasta is well coated. Serve with grated Parmesan cheese on top.
